sms_options_recredit_information_text:
You can automatically re-credit your account if your balance exceeds a certain threshold.
This re-credit process takes place automatically, and is charged to your OVH customer account.
sms_options_recredit_information_note: Please note that re-crediting is only possible if the balance for your OVH customer account is positive or at 0. You can credit your customer account via the OVH Control Panel, in the Billing section.
sms_options_recredit_update_threshold_er: The minimum value of this field is 0.
